title: Worst Date Wednesday: The Seat Upgrade
description: Jacob tells us the awful date he went on with a guy who had a connection on the airline Jacob was about to fly on so he said he could get him a seat upgrade.  Later in the date the guy went to the bathroom and never came back.  Turns out his ex-wife came and picked him up.  Did Jacob still get that seat upgrade?
itunes:summary: Jacob tells us the awful date he went on with a guy who had a connection on the airline Jacob was about to fly on so he said he could get him a seat upgrade.  Later in the date the guy went to the bathroom and never came back.  Turns out his ex-wife came and picked him up.  Did Jacob still get that seat upgrade?
